description: Children aged 11-15 can get free and discounted travel on all our transport with a Zip Oyster photocard.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Children aged 11-15 can get free and discounted travel on all our transport services with a Zip Oyster photocard."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"image","link":{"image":{}},"image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/11-15-zip-card_rdax_400x250.jpg","alt":"11-15 oyster zip card"},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Benefits"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Free travel on buses and trams","Child rate fares on Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and Emirates Air Line","50% off most fares on \u003ca href=\"http://www.nationalrail.co.uk/times_fares/46494.aspx\"\u003eNational Rail services\u003c/a\u003e ","50% off adult rate tickets on the \u003ca href=\"/modes/river/about-river-bus\"\u003eThames Clippers River Bus services\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Who is it for?"}
Children aged over 10 years and 11 months, and under 16 on 31 August can get an 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard.
If your child was 15 on 31 August, they can still apply for and use an 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard, even though they'll use it when they're 16.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How to apply"}
A parent or guardian must apply for an 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard.
When you apply, you agree that Zip Oyster photocard holders will comply with our Young Person's Behaviour Code . If they don't, we can withdraw their photocard.
{"template":"video","style":"5tu7mMA8rd0","title":"Apply online for a Zip Oyster","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
To apply online , you need to provide:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Active email address","Details from your child's machine-readable passport to verify their identity (If you can't provide this, follow the instructions online. You'll need to go a Post Office to complete your application.)"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.passport.service.gov.uk/help/photo-rules\"\u003eDigital photo\u003c/a\u003e of your child which must be a .jpg, .bmp or .gif file and less than 6MB"]}
If you have a contactless and Oyster account for a non-Zip Oyster photocard, you need to use a different email address to create a photocard web account .
You pay an administration fee of £15 using a credit or debit card.
We'll post your 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard to you within one week of applying.
You apply online and need to provide:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Active email address","Details from your child's machine-readable passport to verify their identity (if you don't have one, you must apply four weeks in advance)"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.passport.service.gov.uk/help/photo-rules\"\u003eDigital photo\u003c/a\u003e of your child which must be a .jpg, .bmp or .gif file and less than 6MB"]}
You pay an administration fee of £15 using a credit or debit card.
If we can verify your child's identity online, we'll post their 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard within one week of applying.
If we can't, you'll need to take proof of identity to collect their 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard from a Visitor Centre .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Collect from a Visitor Centre"}
You need to apply four weeks in advance to collect a Zip Oyster from a Visitor Centre .
We'll email you when your application is complete, and you can choose which Visitor Centre to collect from.
Bring your application complete email with you and provide one of the following to prove your child's identity:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Valid passport","ID card from a European Economic Area country","Birth certificate"]}
If you need to change the photo on your 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard, your collection date may change.
You apply online and need to provide:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Active email address"," \u003ca href=\"https://www.passport.service.gov.uk/help/photo-rules\"\u003eDigital photo\u003c/a\u003e of your child which must be a .jpg, .bmp or .gif file and less than 6MB","Credit or debit card to pay an administration fee of £15"]}
We'll email you when your application is complete and you can then collect your 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard from a Visitor Centre .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Collect from a Visitor Centre"}
You need to apply four weeks in advance to collect a Zip Oyster from a Visitor Centre .
We'll email you when your application is complete, and you can choose which Visitor Centre to collect from.
You need to provide:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Application complete email","Proof of your child's identity using either an original valid passport, ID card from a European Economic Area country or birth certificate"]}
If you need to change the photo on your 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard, your collection date may change.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How to use"}
Once you get your 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard, you can use it straight away.
Make sure you touch in at the start of your journey and touch out at the end on yellow card readers. You only need to touch in on buses and trams.
Use your photocard web account to manage your card or report a lost card.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Expiry"}
11-15 Zip Oyster photocards expire on 30 September in the year after your child's 16th birthday.
A parent or guardian can then apply for a 16+ Zip Oyster photocard .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Young Visitor discount"}
If you don't live in London and you're visiting with children who don't have an 11-15 Zip Oyster photocard, they can get discounted travel for up to 14 days with the Young Visitor discount:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["50% off adult-rate pay as you go fares and daily caps on bus, Tube, tram, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and most National Rail services","50% off adult rate tickets on the \u003ca href=\"/modes/emirates-air-line/index\"\u003eEmirates Air Line\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/modes/river/about-river-bus\"\u003eThames Clippers River Bus services\u003c/a\u003e "]}
The discount can be added to a standard Oyster card or Visitor Oyster card by a member of staff at:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Any Tube, London Overground or TfL Rail station"," \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e (except Gatwick Airport South Terminal)","Victoria National Rail station ticket office"]}
The children must be with you when you ask for the Young Visitor discount.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Travelling with a discounted Day Travelcard"}

Children aged 5-15 can get a discounted Off-Peak Zones 1-6 or 1-9 Day Travelcard , when accompanied by an adult buying a discounted Off-Peak Zones 1-6 or 1-9 Day Travelcard at a ticket machine, using a valid:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/free-and-discounted-travel/annual-gold-card-discount\"\u003eAnnual Gold Card\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.network-railcard.co.uk/\"\u003eNetwork Railcard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.familyandfriends-railcard.co.uk/\"\u003eFamily and Friends Railcard\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://www.hmforces-railcard.co.uk/\"\u003eHM Forces Railcard\u003c/a\u003e "]}
When travelling, you must accompany children whilst using your discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcard.
To buy a discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcard at London Overground, TfL Rail, National Rail Station ticket office or Visitor Centre, you must show your Railcard or Annual Gold Card to staff.
